text: Gomɗii yeddii ɓen wi'uɓe : "Allaahu on ko Mema-sella ɓiɗɗo Maryama on". Maaku : "Ko hommbo waawani Alla goɗɗun si O Faandike nde O Halkata Mema-sella ɓiɗɗo Maryama on, e yumma makko, e ko woni ka leydi kon fow ?" Ko Alla Woodani Laamu kammuuli ɗin, e leydi ndin, e ko woni hakkunde majji. Himo Taga ko O Muuyi. Alla ko Hattanɗo kala huunde
